work.base: Mobile; formerly Anchorage, Alaska; Reaver Base, Australian Outback, Australia; Empire State Building, New York, New York

connections.groupAffiliation: Former ally of X-Men, partner of N'Astirh
connections.relatives: Mister Sinister (creator), Jean Grey (Phoenix, genetic template), Scott Summers (Cyclops, husband), Nathan Christopher Summers (Cable, son), Christopher Summers (Corsair, father-in-law), Alex Summers (Havok, brother-in-law)
